long_description: The Patagonia Houdini jacket for women runs right through fickle weather. Don't need the protection? Presto chango! It stuffs into its own zippered chest pocket with a carabiner clip-in loop. Ripstop nylon fabric is tough and breathable, while the Durable Water Repellent finish fends off light precipitation. Low-volume hood cinches around face and head, and it adjusts with a single pull. Elastic cuffs and drawcord hem keep out drafts. Reflective logos at chest and back neck help keep you visible at night. The Patagonia Houdini jacket for women offers a slim fit.
short_description: The Patagonia Houdini jacket for women runs right through fickle weather. Don't need the protection? Presto chango! It stuffs into its own zippered chest pocket with a carabiner clip-in loop.
